name: git_stash_cherrypick
description: Stash changes temporarily and cherry-pick commits

args: cd /tmp/test-repo && echo 'Work in progress' >> README.md && git stash push -m 'WIP changes' && git stash list

expected_output.example:
stash@{0}: On main: WIP changes

Changes stashed

args: cd /tmp/test-repo && git stash show -p stash@{0} | head -10

expected_output.example:
diff --git a/README.md b/README.md
+Work in progress

Stash contents shown

args: cd /tmp/test-repo && git stash pop && git status --short

expected_output.example:
M README.md

Stashed changes applied and dropped
